name: 小林正雪 復仇之密室
name_original: 小林正雪 復仇之密室
description:
Cheney Wood, who others see as frivolous, is an intelligent police officer. He has recently relocated to another city to escape from someone he dislike. He is flooded with different criminal cases on a daily basis but he can easily manage. He is about to face the biggest challenge since he joined the police force……

This game is only for Traditional Chinese now. The English version will come soon.
